QuestData.Title: Counter-Plague Research
QuestData.Description: I once worked for the so-called "Banshee-Queen", Sylvanas, as an apothecary. I used to admire her, but something's changed within her. She's not herself anymore.$b$bI broke my vows with the Forsaken and joined the Crusade. Now, I use my knowledge of alchemy to seek a counter-plague agent. And the Plaguewood is the perfect place to do so.$b$bI need to resupply a few reagents, any of which can be found within the Plaguewood. I'll pay you if you can find any of these items.
QuestData.LogDescription: Obtain 20 Rotberries, 5 Disembodied Arms, and 1 pile of Flesh Giant Foot Scrapings.
QuestData.RewardText: I love the smell of fresh foot scrapings, don't you?$b$bIf we're going to find a cure to the plague, we need to get creative with our ingredients. Now, if you don't mind, I'm going to get back to work.
